Detailed Description

The structure atoms which gave rise to the sitemap (interaction) points.

Load a sitemap atoms file.

Load the sitemap atoms file given the path stored in filename

Populate the atoms by appending all residues which have at least one atom within interaction distance of any ligand atom

SitemapAtomsFile::SitemapAtomsFile ( PDBStructure *  prot_atoms,
BoundingVolume *  site_vol,
const int  min_chain_size,
const atom_map_t &  a_tbl 
)

Populate the atoms by appending all residues which have at least one atom within the "original" bounding volume plus an additional buffer of max_interaction_dist

Write all the non-hydrogen atoms to 'out' in xyzr format.

Note: if one want certain types of atoms, etc, they should be specified through the constructor interface or possibly use PDBStructure instead
